p: To further elucidate the structure of the JC-PS1, NMR spectroscopy, an efficient and convenient technique, was used to provide more straightforward and detailed information on the structure of JC-PS1, including anomeric configurations, linkage patterns and linkage sequences of the repeating units. Based on methylation analysis, monosaccharide composition analysis and NMR analysis, their chemical shifts were assigned as listed in Table 2.
